author: Special Correspondent
text:
The District Legal Services Authority (DLSA) is reaching out to tribal residents on Bargur hills with legal awareness programme on Saturday.

Litigants

The programme to be held at Thamaraikarai under the aegis of DLSA and Pasumai Siragugal is expected to benefit several hundreds of litigants on the hills.

District and Sessions Judge G.P. Elango and Principal Sessions Judge G. Nagarajan will provide the litigant public insights into securing monthly maintenance, accident claims, compensation for deaths occurring while digging wells due to inhalation of poisonous gas, compensation for fatal fall from palm trees while climbing, compensation for electrocution, assistance for inter-caste marriage, and settlement of property and land dispute through Lok Adalats.
title: DLSA to create legal awareness among tribals in Bargur hills
